name: Planet Marketing
description:
We are a professional internet marketing company based in San Diego. We help clients rank higher for keywords that generate business. Our online marketing strategies cover SEO, Adwords & BingAds, Google Analytics, Link Building and more.Â 
We know our current clients' businesses very well and have helped them make lots of sales over the years.
All SEO is white hat. We do not practice grey or black hat SEO. We are a safe AND reliable company to work with.
